title: A shop plugin allowed to sell negative items.
description: People sell negative quantity items to get free money without even needing the items.

title: An economy plugin had a funny race condition.
description: Money shenanigans allowed to increase/decrease money at will exponantially if abused.

title: Infinite money with emeralds.
description: The new in-house built shop plugin is still very new. Turns out having a default price of $0.01 is a bad idea and can be weaponized.

title: A plugin had a funny race condition.
A plugin had another funny race condition.
description: Too slow to exploit, but still funny. Fun fact, found in the same hour as the previous one.

title: Same plugin, same race condition, different situation.
description: A bug in the same plugin caused this race condition to be exploitable in a different way.

title: Unintentional shop items.
description: Spyglasses, Pottery Sherds, and Brushes were able to sold, despite them being supposed to
